definition: inside or closer to the inside of the body
details:
adjective
- inside or closer to the inside of the body
= example: inside or closer to the inside of the body
- located inward
= example: located inward
= synonyms: interior
- innermost or essential
= example: innermost or essential
= synonyms: intimate
- exclusive to a center
- confined to an exclusive group
= example: confined to an exclusive group
= synonyms: inside
- located or occurring within or closer to a center
